content:
Hi, I would ask for advice.

There is a need to work with an epicrisis in the FHIR format.
In my case, epicrisis contains a number of sections: connection with treatment in hospitals, connection with the examination, brief history, diagnostic studies, course of the disease, treatment carried out, condition at the direction, condition at discharge.

As far as I understand, correctly implement such an aggregation using an FHIR document.
Connection with the appeal to the health care facility, we map on Encounter, but I lack knowledge of how to act with other sections.

I would be grateful for any advice or help.
Looking at the IPS (International patient Summary) implementation guide for FHIR Documents will likely provide you with lots of pointers: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-ips/
